name: Jewellery shopping
author: a TripAdvisor user
reviewBody: I went to this place on recommendations from trip advisor and I was not disappointed. Having had a bad experience an d having been badly ripped off jewellery shopping in Colombo in the past it was a pleasure to meet a family who treated one with respect and we\'re not pushy in any way and who did not try to sell something not wanted. The owners were most accommodating in making a piece at short notice and were very expert in their knowledge of gemstones and very generous in sharing their knowledge\nHighly recommended!
